entry.title: Siren & Critter: Origins
entry.summary:
Author: Maybeanartist02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,939Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Shana Reyes never wanted to have to run away. She was raised in Maryland, and had always seen little reason to leave. However, when her relationship with her aunt and stepfather reaches a tipping point, with her mother not strong enough to stand up for her daughter, Sanaa decides enough is enough, and that for once, facing her problems is getting her nowhere. On a whim, she goes off the grid and decides to go back to where her life started: Gotham City.Sage Benson is fine with how things are. They're best friends with their roommate--who moonlights as a vigilante, FYI--and they're on good terms with their dad back in Maryland. They have a stable job in Bludhaven, and haven't thought about their college ex in years. They're content with their lack of romance, and content with having such a small social circle. However, when their best friend disappears off the face of the earth, only to reappear a month later in Gotham, Sage reconsiders the passive life they've been living.
